distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for nodejs16 fixes the following issues:

Update to nodejs LTS version 16.20.0:

Security fixes:

 - CVE-2022-25881: Fixed ReDoS vulnerability in http-cache-semantics (bsc#1208744).

Other changes:  

 - update undici to 5.20.0
 - update c-ares to 1.19.0
 - update npm to 8.19.4
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: This affects versions of the package http-cache-semantics before 4.1.1. The issue can be exploited via malicious request header values sent to a server, when that server reads the cache policy from the request using this library.
notes.title: CVE description
